verbs.description: [ARG0: The challenge to President Trump 's ban on travelers from a handful of predominantly Muslim countries] [V: relies] [ARGM-ADV: in part] [ARG1: on his own campaign promises , statements and tweets dating back to 2015] . Here 's a look at the record .
